Package org.apache.juneau.internal

Class ThrowableUtils

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.internal.ThrowableUtils
public class ThrowableUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Various utility methods for creating and working with throwables.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  ThrowableUtils.SupplierWithThrowable<T>
    Interface used with safeSupplier(SupplierWithThrowable).

  • Constructor Summary

    ThrowableUtils()

    Casts or wraps the specified throwable to the specified type.

  • Constructor Details

    • ThrowableUtils

      public ThrowableUtils()

  • Method Details

    • asRuntimeException

      public static java.lang.RuntimeException asRuntimeException​(java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Creates a new RuntimeException.
      Parameters:
      cause - The caused-by exception.
      Returns:
      A new RuntimeException, or the same exception if it's already of that type.

    • cast

      public static <T> T cast​(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.lang.Throwable t)
      Casts or wraps the specified throwable to the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The class to cast to.
      Parameters:
      type - The class to cast to.
      t - The throwable to cast.
      Returns:
      Either the same exception if it's already the specified type, or a wrapped exception.

    • getCause

      public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> T getCause​(java.lang.Class<T> c, java.lang.Throwable t)
      Same as Throwable.getCause() but searches the throwable chain for an exception of the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The throwable type to search for.
      Parameters:
      c - The throwable type to search for.
      t - The throwable to search.
      Returns:
      The exception, or null if not found.

    • safeSupplier

      public static <T> T safeSupplier​(ThrowableUtils.SupplierWithThrowable<T> supplier)
      Allows you to wrap a supplier that throws an exception so that it can be used in a fluent interface.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The supplier type.
      Parameters:
      supplier - The supplier throwing an exception.
      Returns:
      The supplied result.
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - if supplier threw an exception.

    • safeRun

      public static void safeRun​(Snippet snippet)
      Runs a snippet of code and encapsulates any throwable inside a RuntimeException.
      Parameters:
      snippet - The snippet of code to run.

    • getStackTrace

      public static java.lang.String getStackTrace​(java.lang.Throwable t)
      Convenience method for getting a stack trace as a string.
      Parameters:
      t - The throwable to get the stack trace from.
      Returns:
      The same content that would normally be rendered via t.printStackTrace()

    • hash

      public static int hash​(java.lang.Throwable t, java.lang.String stopClass)
      Calculates a 16-bit hash for the specified throwable based on it's stack trace.
      Parameters:
      t - The throwable to calculate the stack trace on.
      stopClass - Optional stop class on which to stop calculation of a stack trace beyond when found.
      Returns:
      A calculated hash.
